function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adherence to social distancing measures","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Enforcement of social distancing guidelines, public awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, occupancy monitoring systems","People":"General public, particularly in urban settings","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Limited personal space and proximity to others","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease transmission in crowded environments","Mitigation":"Redesign of public spaces, use of physical barriers, capacity restrictions","Technologies":"Occupancy monitoring systems, automated crowd control systems","People":"Individuals in crowded urban areas, public gathering places","Owner":"Urban planners, architects, facility managers"},{"Description":"Lack of biophilic design and healing environments","Impact":"Increased stress and anxiety in the built environment","Mitigation":"Incorporation of biophilic design principles, creation of healing spaces","Technologies":"Natural ventilation systems, green infrastructure, indoor plant installations","People":"Residents, workers, and visitors in built environments","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, building owners"}]}
